scripts.build: cd frontend && yarn build && cd .. && wails build
scripts.install: cd frontend && yarn install && cd - && go mod tidy && yarn build
scripts.lint: cd frontend && yarn lint && cd .. && golangci-lint run
scripts.test-go-detail: echo 'detailed testing may take 30 seconds...' ; cd ./pkg/types ; go test -tags=detailed ./... ; cd -
scripts.test: export $(grep -v '^#' ./.env | xargs) >/dev/null && yarn test-go && yarn test-tsx
